name: The Elements
overview: A science\educational game that will help you understand the periodic table of elements, published in Loadstar #173. A displayer and tutorial on the most amazing table of all: the Periodic Table of the Elements. The game has a table of 103 of the chemical elements. Each element shown in its order in the periodic chart, and includes its name, atomic symbol, atomic number, atomic weight, discoveries (if any) and date of discovery. After reviewing the info hit F3 to enable the element quiz to test you knowledge.
